statements: SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE status='approved';
SELECT policy_holder, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_id=1001;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_date FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_amount, status FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_id = 101 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_holder, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT policy_id, claim_date, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM insurance_claims GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT policy_holder, COUNT(*) AS claim_count FROM insurance_claims GROUP BY policy_holder HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY claim_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE policy_holder LIKE '%Smith%' AND status IN ('pending', 'approved') ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, policy_id, claim_date FROM claims WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, claim_date, amount FROM claims WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, start_date, end_date FROM policies WHERE premium >= 500.75;
SELECT policy_id, AVG(premium) AS avg_premium FROM policies GROUP BY policy_id;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, amount FROM claims WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder, start_date, end_date FROM policies WHERE premium < 500 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT claim_id, amount, status FROM claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder, start_date, end_date, premium FROM policies WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_date FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_status FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT update_date, update_description, update_author FROM claim_history ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, risk_factor, analysis_date, analyst_name FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_factor > 0.8 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, policy_number, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT claim_status FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT * FROM claim_history JOIN insurance_claims ON claim_history.claim_id = insurance_claims.claim_id WHERE insurance_claims.policy_number = 12345;
SELECT claim_id, analyst_name FROM risk_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim;
SELECT policy_id, insurer FROM policy WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM insurance_claim ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, amount_paid FROM claim_history WHERE amount_paid > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, status FROM claim_status WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim WHERE claim_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT policy.insurer, insurance_claim.claim_amount FROM policy INNER JOIN insurance_claim ON policy.policy_id = insurance_claim.policy_id;
SELECT claim_id, status FROM claim_status WHERE claim_id IN (SELECT claim_id FROM claim_history WHERE amount_paid > 1000);
SELECT * FROM insurance_claim WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 AND policy_id = 101 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;

SELECT policy.insurer, SUM(claim_history.amount_paid) AS total_paid FROM policy INNER JOIN insurance_claim ON policy.policy_id = insurance_claim.policy_id INNER JOIN claim_history ON insurance_claim.claim_id = claim_history.claim_id GROUP BY policy.insurer;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_address FROM claimants WHERE claimant_id = 1;
SELECT policy_number, policy_type FROM insurance_policies WHERE policy_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, status_description FROM claim_status JOIN claim_history ON claim_status.status_id = claim_history.claim_status_id;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC, claim_amount DESC
SELECT claimant_name, claimant_phone, claimant_address FROM claimants WHERE LENGTH(claimant_name) > 10

SELECT policy_type, COUNT(*) AS total_claims FROM insurance_policies JOIN insurance_claims ON insurance_policies.policy_number = insurance_claims.policy_number GROUP BY policy_type ORDER BY total_claims DESC

SELECT insurance_claims.claim_id, claim_status.status_description FROM insurance_claims JOIN claim_history ON insurance_claims.claim_id = claim_history.claim_id JOIN claim_status ON claim_history.claim_status_id = claim_status.status_id WHERE DATE(claim_history.claim_date) = '2022-01-15'

SELECT claimant_name, claimant_address, COUNT(*) AS num_claims FROM claimants JOIN insurance_claims ON claimants.claimant_id = insurance_claims.policy_number GROUP BY claimant_name, claimant_address HAVING num_claims > 1 ORDER BY num_claims DESC
